sentences.target: Alice was beginning to get very tired of sitting by her sister on the bank.
sentences.native: Alice commençait à être très fatiguée d'être assise près de sa sœur sur la berge.

sentences.target: She had nothing to do and had once or twice peeked into the book her sister was reading.
sentences.native: Elle n'avait rien à faire et avait jeté un coup d'œil une ou deux fois dans le livre que sa sœur lisait.

sentences.target: But it had no pictures or conversations in it.
sentences.native: Mais il n'y avait ni images ni conversations dedans.

sentences.target: "What is the use of a book," thought Alice, "without pictures or conversations?"
sentences.native: "À quoi sert un livre," pensa Alice, "sans images ni conversations?"

sentences.target: So she was considering in her own mind whether the pleasure of making a daisy chain would be worth the trouble.
sentences.native: Alors elle se demandait si le plaisir de faire une couronne de pâquerettes vaudrait la peine.

sentences.target: Suddenly a White Rabbit with pink eyes ran close by her.
sentences.native: Soudain, un Lapin Blanc aux yeux roses passa près d'elle en courant.

sentences.target: There was nothing so very remarkable in that.
sentences.native: Il n'y avait rien de très remarquable à cela.

sentences.target: Alice did not think it so very much out of the way to hear the Rabbit say to itself.
sentences.native: Alice ne trouvait pas si extraordinaire d'entendre le Lapin se parler à lui-même.

sentences.target: "Oh dear! Oh dear! I shall be too late!"
sentences.native: "Oh là là! Oh là là! Je vais être en retard!"

sentences.target: When she thought it over afterwards, it occurred to her that she ought to have wondered at this.
sentences.native: Quand elle y repensa plus tard, il lui vint à l'esprit qu'elle aurait dû s'en étonner.

sentences.target: But at the time it all seemed quite natural.
sentences.native: Mais sur le moment, tout semblait tout à fait naturel.

sentences.target: When the Rabbit actually took a watch out of its waistcoat pocket, Alice started to her feet.
sentences.native: Quand le Lapin sortit effectivement une montre de la poche de son gilet, Alice se leva d'un bond.
